text: @realDonaldTrump Not only do you lack vocabulary but no scruples, no morales, no brains and by far zero idea about thinking before you speak. KDM? On paper maybe but you have no idea about living and working in the trenches. The fact you test yourself twice for COVID-19 is an understatement.
